Ushers Road State Forest

The Ushers Road State Forest trailhead lies approximately one mile east of Northway Exit 10 off Ushers Road. This forest offers a 1.4 mile loop trail through wooded terrain, along with a short connector to the Zim Smith Trail. As you walk deeper into the woods, youâ€™ll see some older growth pines, along with some marshy areas and streams. The trail appears to be well-kept, with several bridges and wood structures allowing you to avoid stepping into wet areas.
